name: Brain fart (Félix Metzinger)
description:
A wario-ware like mini game collection about when your brain loose control.

Made with love and the means at hand on Godot Engine.

Team :

• Guilin Braïda : Music, Sound design and Graphism.

• Jules Playa : Graphism.

• Sarah Germain : Graphism.

• Félix Metzinger : Programmation

+ the help of Victor, Wan Qi and Ponyo.

Tips & Notes:

- To reload the game you have to reload the page until we put a restart button

- The shirt buttons from bottom to top

- The web version may have some sound isues

- We are a french team so if you spot any spelling mistake please tell us
